title: Trump weighs new travel restrictions as ban nears expiration
text: "Our guiding principle," Taylor said, "was this: We need to know who is coming into our country. We should be able to validate their identities, and we should be able to confirm that our foreign partners do have information suggesting such individuals may represent a threat to the United States."
summary:
"Our guiding principle," Taylor said, "was this: We need to know who is coming into our country.
We should be able to validate their identities, and we should be able to confirm that our foreign partners do have information suggesting such individuals may represent a threat to the United States."
